overview: Horse-hung royal stallion Prince Richard dreams of a life where he can plough his thick uncut dick into any begging boy, and getting his ass serviced in return, but alas, the heir to the throne cannot!! His insatiable younger brother enjoys the lifestyle Richard craves, but the fantasises we get are second to none, with cum soaked royalty around every corner.
tagline: Prince Richard is being groomed to take his rightful place as King of England. But he is troubled by constant lustful thoughts of sweaty sex with men.
title: BadBoy
